properties.entry: SELECT NVL(SUM(PRICE),0) salesRate FROM PRODUCT JOIN TRADE USING(PRODUCT_NO)
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) tstockgoods FROM PRODUCT WHERE UPLOAD_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YY/MM/DD')
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) reportedproduct FROM (SELECT DISTINCT PRODUCT_NO FROM PRODUCT JOIN REPORT USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE REPORT_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YY/MM/DD'))
SELECT COUNT(*) "count" FROM PRODUCT WHERE UPLOAD_TYPE='Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_NO , SELLER_NO , PRODUCT_NAME , PRICE , ZONE , UPLOAD_DATE FROM PRODUCT WHERE UPLOAD_TYPE = 'Y' ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT CATEGORY_NAME , CATEGORY_NO , COUNT(CATEGORY_NO) "count" FROM PRODUCT JOIN CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) GROUP BY CATEGORY_NAME , CATEGORY_NO
SELECT PRODUCT_NO , SELLER_NO , PRODUCT_NAME , PRICE , ZONE , UPLOAD_DATE FROM PRODUCT WHERE UPLOAD_TYPE = 'Y' AND PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%'||?||'%' ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO DESC
SELECT CATEGORY_NAME , CATEGORY_NO , COUNT(PRODUCT_NAME) count FROM PRODUCT JOIN CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) WHERE PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%'||?||'%' GROUP BY CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY_NO
